import React, {useState} from 'react'; export default function TextForm() { const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ firstName:"", lastName: "", phone:"", email:"", }); let name, value; const handleChange =(event) =>{ name = event.target.value; value = event.target.value; setUserData({...userData,[name]: value}); }; return ( <>
